files.help: For now you can move `.acme.sh/` to `"$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/acme.sh/` and alias `acme` to `acme.sh --home "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/acme.sh/`. See the [documentation](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/wiki/How-to-install#4-advanced-installation) or [this issue](https://github.com/acmesh-official/acme.sh/issues/4408) for details.
